attributes.action: to understand the situation of out of colntrol children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Has it ever occured to the government, that the situation of out of control children is sometimes caused by the fact, that home life is desperate not only for them but for their parents...the continual struggle to make ends meet scrimping and scraping, making cut backs, and the depression and frustration that causes the parents, rubs of on the children of all ages causing anger and resentment which then goes to the steets with them...we petition the P.M. to  help families not hinder them by more tax burdens and errors. allow people to breathe this has got to be the most taxed population in the modern world

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
